1.name: Article I
1.description: The Capital of the Province of Shrewsbuquerque will be located in Waffle City and may not be moved.

2.name: Article II
2.description: The law of the Province may not contradict that of the Nation, even as new laws are added. In addition, the beliefs of Darzos reign over the Province.

3.name: Article III
3.description: The Governor and Provincial Ambassador cannot be the same person. Ideally, the Provincial Ambassador will be a sitting Councilman, though this is not required. Consistency is preferable.

4.name: Article IV
4.description: When referencing the Province of Shrewsbuquerque, it is only acceptable to do so by its full name: Shrewsbuquerque.

5.name: Article V
5.description: The job of the Shrewsbuquerquese Governor is to enforce the lack of heresies, and to point out heretics. The citizens are to enforce the honor of the Darzos clan by driving out heresies, including everything from celebrating Christmas early to microwaving ramen.

6.name: Article VI
6.description: The Province of Shrewsbuquerque will have an embassy in the City of New Caledonia, and that land will be under the jurisdiction of the Province and this Constitution. It is not to be larger than a plot measuring sixteen in both length and width.

7.name: Article VII
7.description: The Church of Darzos within the Shrewsbuquerquese borders is a designated “survival of the fittest” zone, except during party time. This means that in any time aside from Party Time, the Church of Darzos recognizes a rule of “every man for himself”.

8.name: Article VIII
8.description: On the holidays of Nice (June 9 and September 6), all Darzodians are to take a pilgrimage to the Church of Darzos.

9.name: Article IX
9.description: Any and all violations of Shrewsbuquerquese law will be taken to provincial court, but all violations of National law will be handed over to the Council in federal court, if applicable.

10.name: Article X
10.description: The province logo shall be designed by a Darzodian working independently, and the borders are to be clearly marked in-game

11.name: Article XI
11.description: Lawmakers shall be a three-seated Shrewsbuquerquese Founders’ Council (SFC) consisting of the three founders of the Darzos religion. The laws made will affect only the provincial borders and the Embassy.

12.name: Article XII
12.description: Even when the Governor does not sit on the SFC, he can create executive orders that last one week each, unless the SFC decides to sign it into law. Any executive order may be signed only once for every four-month national election cycle.

12.1.name: Article XII Amendment A
12.1.description: If the Governor does sit on the SFC, he will be the speaker of the council.

12.2.name: Article XII Amendment B
12.2.description: Executive orders do not have the ability to override pre-existing articles.

12.3.name: Article XII Amendment C
12.3.description: anyone can run for governor, but the remaining SFC who is not running will vote on who takes the position

13.name: Article XIII
13.description: Governor has the power to enforce laws through the Prevention, Response, Intelligence, and Municipal Entity or PRIME, which is a division of the overall Enforcer Corps.

13.1.name: Article XIII Amendment A
13.1.description: The captain of PRIME has the choice of accepting and denying members, but a majority council may overturn this decision.

14.name: Article XIV
14.description: The official road system of the province is Roadway-Railway oRganization or RRR (rolling Rs or rar for those who can't).

15.name: Article XV
15.description: The slums is the only area where article V will not be actively enforced. Heretics may make a living here.

15.1.name: Article XV Amendment A
15.1.description: Slums? What slums? There is no slums here!

16.name: Article XVI
16.description: the Construction, Repair, and Planning  Division or the CRAP Division is the official organization controlling plots and Shrewsbuquerquese projects.

17.name: Article XVII
17.description: The province of Shrewsbuquerque will have its own form of credit, Darzodian Credit. Businesses will not be forced to use this credit but every two darzodian credits are worth one galactic credit (national form of money). As the National Census will be taken using Galactic Credits, you must use a monetary value equaling total Galactic Credits.

18.name: Article XVIII
18.description: The Founder Council member of each city (Nate is Waffle City, Alex is Hahira, Dylan is Wayward Pines) may put in place a maximum of 10 city laws that do not contradict national or provincial laws. City laws will be known as Statutes with either WC, WP, or H to make certain the city it is enforced in.

19.name: Article XIX
19.description: The governor has the right to accept and kick out citizens, but an SFC majority can override either decision

20.name: Article XX
20.description: A public mine in Hahira built by the council may be the only mine allowed in Shrewsbuquerque.

21.name: Article XXI
21.description: July 1-7 is officially the Spite Brits Week.

22.name: Article XXII
22.description: The Province of Shrewsbuquerque Discord server may have ONE (1) pro-swearing chat, given it is marked as an NSFW chat. This is the only chat in which this will be allowed.

23.name: Article XXIII
23.description: Insults against and about being a heretic are legal, but will only apply to those labeled as heretics within the province, or those outside of the providence who are willing to be labeled as such.
